column4: I don't like the labels for my mounted partitions, which show up on my desktop - and I don't want to have to label the partitions anyway, because the labels wouldn't be correct in other cases: how can I either rename what the show up as on the desktop, or failing that, just remove the icons
and, if possible, I'd still like to have the icons in the places menu, just not on the desktop
it is an option for nautilus in the gconf-editor. Does that help?
